name: Hachi Hachi Mystery
description:
Hey! Are you ready to start a new life? A new place, new people, and some unique new friends... Enough to start a great adventure!





  • Meet Léo, a very friendly fan of manga and anime.
  • There is Lucille, a nice and cool person. Maybe you'll fall in love with her...
  • Ethan, a very popular boy with a tempered character. Will you be friend with him?
  • And then Emi, she is Léo's cousin and she also is in high school. She is quite the character!
